page.title: 14MEDWAY
page.content:
In Medway the people are friendly.In summer 1985 the Queen came to Rochester.There were lots of schools there. We saw the Queen's husband, the Duke of Edinburgh, and he waved at us. Some other schools came to our school to make lanterns and banners and we got on quite well.When we got to the Corn Exchange, Rochester, it was very crowded and noisy. The Chinese new year was to celebrate the year of the ox. The lion was very big and the eyes and mouth could move. When you go down town there are lots of people wearing weird clothes. There are mods, skinheads, punks and casuals. They all stand in big groups in the High Street and some do Break Dancing.
By Hardeep Pullies St Peters and St Margarets
